Description: Rim fragment of a Gnathia black-glazed pottery ring-handled kantharos; top of rim lost. Wholly glazed. Incised rifling on body; worn band of leaves in added red and white at rim.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Leiden University, Faculty of Archaeology. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Prins de Jong 1925 / Scherben aus Naukratis: Aus der Sammlung des Universitäts-Professors Dr Fr W Freih von Bissing (p. 70, no. 2)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GR.06)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: XI.2 (cat. no. in Prins de Jong 1925)
